 Calculates the "reflection" vec(Vp) of the velocity vector vec(V) on the slope vec(T). Returns 0 if vec(T)=0.

 Calculates the "reflection" vec(Vp) of the velocity vector vec(V) on the normal vec(N). Returns 0 if vec(N)=0.
